response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product is valued at $12,000 to you. Considering this, I propose to sell it to you for $11,500. This offer allows us both to benefit - you receive a high-quality product at a competitive price, while I secure a transaction that exceeds my cost of acquisition. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11500}
